00896   if (b->length == 0){
00897     return "0";
00898   }
00899 
00900   buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(b->length * get_digits(base) + 2);  
00901   buf += b->length * get_digits(base) + 1;
00902   *(buf--) = 0;
00903   r = b;
00904  
00905   while (r->length > 0){
00906     bignum_div_digit(r, base, &r, &d);
00907     *(buf--) = digits[d];
00908   }
00909   
00910   if (b->negative){
00911     *buf = '-';
00912     return buf;
00913   } else {
00914     return buf+1;
00915   }
00916 }
